name: Ghozt trainer: alpha
description:
This game is developed by BlueBeard a solo indie game company.

This alpha version is the trainer of the game Ghozt.

Ghozt is a story driven game with the sole purpose to entertain you but through the development 
I knew that we can't develop a game that you would enjoy without funding.
So i created a very low budget (actually zero) Demo so that you can try 
my basic game mechanics and tell us about any bugs in the game till we 
finish raising enough money to finish developing Ghozt.
